    • createInMemoryH2Connection

      static Connection createInMemoryH2Connection(String name, String passwd)
      The createH2Connection creates a new Connection.

      passwd - password of database username

    • makeH2ConnectionString

      static String makeH2ConnectionString(String type, String name)
      The makeH2ConnectionString method generates H2 connection string.
      Parameters:
      type - type of storage (i.e. inmemory, file, ...)
      name - database name
      Returns:
      connection string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or empty
